metadata.title: CVE-2022-33105 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Redis v7.0 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the componentstreamGetEdgeID.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-33105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis - 5:7.0.8-4
redis-sentinel - 5:7.0.8-4
redis-server - 5:7.0.8-4
redis-tools - 5:7.0.8-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redis package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5:7.0.8-4').
